---
category: news
title: "Bank of Ireland, Akara and Webio among companies honoured at AI Awards"
excerpt: "Bank of Ireland, Akara Robotics and Webio are among the companies that have been recognised at the annual AI Awards. Bank of Ireland won best application of AI in a large enterprise, while Kinesense took home the award for best use of AI in an SME for its AI-centric research project, the Visual Intelligence Search Platform (VISP)."
